name: Optimism Cult Merch
about: CULT MERCH optimism is an exclusive T-shirt collection consisting of several themes: 1. optimism Cultists. 2. optimistic Evil 3. Opti Samurai. + a few bonus ones: for the OPLabs team and minimalistic ones with different lettering Each print is hand-drawn by me with love. The t-shirts will be two colors, white and black.
question_1: Every person who has a measure of optimism falls under the distribution of OR tokens. I help spread optimism to the masses because my T-shirts can be worn to any event.
question_2: My income from drawing a month 200-300$ This is my only income
